DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine blood level two dos MAP0010 ( corticosteroid ) two dos approve corticosteroid adult asthma safety twice daily dose 7 day .
DOC.brief_title: A Study 2 Doses MAP0010 Adult Asthmatics
DOC.criteria: Male female adult asthmatic mild moderate persistent asthma . 18 45 ( 46th birthday ) year age . Documented diagnosis asthma least 3 month prior Visit 1 , per NIH/NHLBI , EPR3 criterion . Able withhold shortacting bronchodilator ( e.g. , albuterol ipratropium bromide ) least 4 hour prior clinic visit . Baseline FEV1 great equal 50 % predict normal . Any significant illness/abnormality A history upper low respiratory tract infection within 2 week A history acute severe asthma attack require ICU admission ventilatory support .
